metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0794 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The lwp filter in LibreOffice before 5.0.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted LotusWordPro (lwp) document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0794` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libreoffice-mysql-connector - 1:4.2.8-0ubuntu4
No subscription required

libreoffice-wiki-publisher - 1:4.2.8-0ubuntu4
No subscription required
